summary: The lives of four people intertwine after the disappearance of a man who wanders into the forest.
cast: Marie-Ginette Guay|Gilbert Sicotte|Fanny Mallette|Réal Bossé|Pauline Martin|Marie Brassard|Denis Houle|Gary Boudreault|Dominique Quesnel|Daniel Desputeau|Robert Reynaert|Marika Lhoumeau|Jocelyne Zucco|Bonfield Marcoux|Madeleine Péloquin|Gilles Lalonde|Carmen Sylvestre|Claude Paiement|Roger Beaulne|Brigitte Tremblay|Ludovic Berthillot
title: Continental, un film sans fusil
